price: It has seven gates[19]; each gate will have its allotted share of them.”
arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ
footnotes: [19] The doors of Hell are plenty; according to the crime.
